Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to unlawful discriminatory practices relating to persons recovering from alcohol and/or substance abuse
Summary: Relates to unlawful discriminatory practices by government agencies relating to persons recovering from alcohol and/or substance abuse.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to unlawful discriminatory practices by government agencies relating to persons recovering from alcohol and/or substance abuse
